title: Fed Chairman Powell hints at a potential interest rate hike in September
body: In a recent interview, Fed Chairman Jerome Powell stated that the central bank is prepared to take further action to combat inflation, including a possible interest rate hike at the next meeting.

title: SEC delays decision on Ethereum ETF approval
body: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has once again postponed its decision on the approval of several spot Ethereum ETFs, citing the need for more time to review the applications.

title: Gary Gensler tweets about the need for clearer crypto regulations
body: SEC Chairman Gary Gensler's latest tweet emphasizes the importance of protecting investors in the volatile crypto market and hints at upcoming regulatory frameworks.
